about.name: Anastasiia Kolisnyk
about.intro: I'm {name} — an illustrator, designer, and creative entrepreneur based in Trenčín, Slovakia. I create artwork that blends emotional clarity with thoughtful craftsmanship, bringing together illustration, storytelling, multilingual adaptation, and visual identity design.
about.work: My work spans children's books, educational materials, packaging, label design, logos, and print & digital branding. I focus on warm color palettes, intuitive composition, and imagery that feels alive — full of rhythm, sincerity, and gentle wonder.
about.goal: Whether I'm illustrating marine animals for young readers, designing a brand's visual language, or crafting packaging that tells a story, my goal is always the same: to create meaningful, heartfelt visuals that inspire curiosity and connect with people.
about.explore: Explore my portfolio to discover the projects, illustrations, and creative worlds I build with care and imagination.

booksIntro.title: Children's Book Illustrations
booksIntro.subtitle: What I Put Into My Illustrations?
booksIntro.text1: I pour sincerity, emotion, and quiet storytelling into every illustration I create. My work is built on intuition — on the rhythm of lines, the warmth of color, and the small details that make an image feel alive. I strive to capture moments that breathe: gentle gestures, subtle expressions, and the atmosphere that surrounds a story.
booksIntro.text2: I approach each illustration with care and intention. I think about how a child will feel when they see the page, how the colors will guide their curiosity, and how the composition will help them understand the world a little better. My goal is to create images that are not only beautiful, but meaningful — illustrations that comfort, inspire, and invite the viewer to explore.
booksIntro.text3: Every piece I make carries a part of my own experience: my love for nature, my fascination with quiet moments, and my belief that visual storytelling can nurture kindness, imagination, and hope.
